description: Our Printed Nylon Backpack comes in an octagon graphic developed by legendary designer David Hicks. Trimmed in leather, it can accommodate all your belongings with convenient pockets, inside and out.
Holds a 7" tablet, a continental wallet, a small makeup bag, sunglasses and a phone
1 exterior zipper pocket, 2 side slit pockets
title: PRINTED NYLON BACKPACK

description: A new take on a modern classic: the Chelsea Flap Shoulder Bag. Made of glossy pebbled leather, it has an antiqued brass logo and an adjustable toggle-and-chain-accented strap that can be worn doubled or left long. It’s the perfect refined finish to day or evening looks.
Holds a 7" tablet, a continental wallet, sunglasses, a phone and a lip color
Adjustable leather-and-chain strap with 19.92" (50 cm) drop
1 interior slit pocket, 1 interior zipper pocket
May be carried as a shoulder bag or cross-body
title: CHELSEA FLAP SHOULDER BAG

description: Our Scout Baby Bag Tote is a go-to for stylish moms and a great gift for mothers-to-be. Made of durable, easy-to-clean nylon, with an adjustable cross-body strap, it has handy compartments, including exterior bottle pockets, stroller attachments and a removable changing pad.
Includes stroller strap attachments and removable changing pad
title: SCOUT BABY BAG TOTE

description: A fresh revival of one of our favorite silhouettes, the Nylon Belt Bag comes in an octagonal print developed by legendary designer David Hicks. Take a cue from our runway show by wearing it low on the hips or slung over one shoulder.
Holds a mini wallet, a phone and a card case
May be carried as a belt bag or shoulder bag
title: NYLON BELT BAG

description: A new take on a modern classic: the Chelsea Flap Shoulder Bag. Made of glossy pebbled leather, it has an antiqued brass logo and an adjustable toggle-and-chain-accented strap that can be worn doubled or left long. It’s the perfect refined finish to day or evening looks.
Holds a 7" tablet, a continental wallet, sunglasses, a phone and a lip color
Adjustable leather-and-chain strap with 19.92" (50 cm) drop
1 interior slit pocket, 1 interior zipper pocket

description: Scalloped, lace-like edges and a charming hand-painted design make our Oiseau Salad Plate a perfect choice for everyday elegance. Made in Portugal, this earthenware piece, depicting a blue bird surrounded by flowers, has a refined look that mixes well within any place setting. Set of four.
title: OISEAU SALAD PLATE, SET OF 4

description: A modern classic: the Chelsea Convertible Shoulder Bag. Made of glossy pebbled leather, it has an antiqued brass logo and multiple carrying options: a chain that can be worn short or long and cross-body and a leather strap. It’s the perfect refined finish to day or evening looks.
Holds a continental wallet, a phone and a lip color
Adjustable chain strap with 22.51" (56.5 cm) drop

Removable chain-and-leather cross-body strap, with 22.71" (57 cm) drop
8 interior credit card slots, 2 pockets, 1 zipper pocket, 1 bill pocket

Holds a beach towel, a water bottle, a continental wallet and flip-flops

description: Effortless to wear, our Shelby Bootie is a style to carry you from workdays to date nights. The cap-toe silhouette, contoured in smooth and patent leather, hits at a flattering point above the ankle and is set on a comfortable block heel.
title: SHELBY BOOTIE

description: Holds a beach towel, a water bottle, a continental wallet and flip-flops
title: STRIPED STRAW TOTE

description: Effortless to wear, our Shelby Bootie is a style to carry you from workdays to date nights. The cap-toe silhouette, contoured in smooth and patent leather, hits at a flattering point above the ankle and is set on a comfortable block heel.
title: SHELBY BOOTIE

description: A standout for its tomboyish good looks, our slim-fitting Evan Bootie elevates a classic Chelsea style in crackled patent leather with a stacked block heel and contrast platform. The elasticized side panels and a pull tab make the pair easy to slip on.
title: EVAN PATENT BOOTIE

description: Pattern play. Color-blocks, crisp borders and geometric prints join the graphic mix on our Greer Cardigan — a nod to legendary designer David Hicks. Seen on the runway, it’s knit from spun silk, contrasted with printed satin front panels.
Mother-of-pearl button closure at center front
title: GREER CARDIGAN

description: Crafted from longhaired Mongolian shearling, our Evan Bootie revamps a Chukka silhouette with plush texture and meticulous stitchwork. This head-turning statement pair has a lace-up front, balanced by a raw-leather panel on the back.
title: EVAN SHEARLING BOOTIE

description: The essence of understated chic, our Brooke Bootie is a minimalist style with a tiny gold logo on the block heel. Designed to go with everything, this endlessly versatile pair is made from calfskin and finished with a discreet side zip.
title: BROOKE BOOTIE

description: Relaxed and breezy, our Faye Culotte’s wide-leg shape sways as you walk. Worn on the runway, the pleated pair is softly tailored in fluid crepe de chine.
Zipper and button closure at center back
title: FAYE CULOTTE

description: Our silk crepe de chine Arabella Dress features a kaleidoscope print inspired by legendary designer David Hicks’s interiors — a mix of modern, vintage, graphic and abstract. A pleated bib and cinching ties at the neck, waist and cuffs lend romantic notes to this tiered peasant style.
Drawstring ties at neckline, waist and cuffs
title: ARABELLA DRESS

description: The essence of understated chic. Our pull-on Brooke Slouchy Boot updates a favorite minimalist style in soft napa leather, designed to scrunch around the calf. Endlessly versatile, with a tiny logo on the block heel, it goes with everything from slim jeans to skirts.
title: BROOKE SLOUCHY BOOT

description: A standout for its tomboyish good looks, our slim-fitting Evan Bootie elevates a classic Chelsea style in tumbled leather with a stacked block heel. The elasticized side panels and a pull tab make the pair easy to slip on.
title: EVAN BOOTIE

description: Pattern play. Color-blocks, crisp borders and geometric prints join the graphic mix on our Sloane Dress — a nod to legendary designer David Hicks. This handkerchief-hem showpiece from the runway has a bead- and sequin-accented grosgrain sash at one shoulder and a curving ruched seam that gives way to ties tipped with leaf-shaped appliqus.
Hidden zipper closure at side seam
title: SLOANE DRESS

description: Pattern play. Color-blocks, crisp borders and geometric prints join the graphic mix on our Aston Tunic — a nod to legendary designer David Hicks. It’s made from lustrous silk-satin, with a slit neck and a bib front.
title: ASTON TUNIC

description: Colorful, soft-focus stripes create a modern tie-dye effect on our Addie Top, a standout piece from the runway. The button-down sculpts a crisp silhouette in paneled silk georgette with a sailor-inspired collar and camp-style sleeves that fasten with leather D-ring straps.
Cotton poplin collar; cotton piqué placket
title: ADDIE TOP

description: Colorful, soft-focus stripes create a modern tie-dye effect on our Fiona Pant, a standout piece from the runway. The style sculpts a slouchy, easy-fitting silhouette in twill fabric with a high waist and a sweeping wide leg.
title: FIONA PANT

description: Our Alyssa Sweater features a kaleidoscope print inspired by legendary designer David Hicks’s interiors — a mix of modern, vintage, graphic and abstract. This striking pullover is made from crepe cotton, overlaid in the front by a silk-twill panel.
title: ALYSSA SWEATER

description: Colorful, soft-focus stripes create a modern tie-dye effect on our Bettina Top, a standout look from the runway. It sculpts a streamlined silhouette in pieced silk georgette with a banded collar and two rows of polished dome buttons.
Cotton piqu collar; cotton poplin back yoke
title: BETTINA TOP

description: A look we love: louche pajama dressing — beautifully embodied by our vintage-inspired Sienna Top, the vibrant silk twill button-down Tory wore to the spring runway show. Its collage print is based on personal scrapbooks belonging to legendary designer David Hicks.
title: SIENNA TOP

description: Chic layered over everything from t-shirts to bow blouses: Our slightly shrunken Margaux Cardigan is made in a lightweight cotton crepe knit, with a row of signature logo buttons and bracelet-length sleeves.
title: MARGEAUX CARDIGAN

description: Colorful, soft-focus stripes create a modern tie-dye effect on our Fiona Skirt. It’s made in twill fabric with a fluid drape and an inverted pleat, emphasizing the swishy A-line silhouette.
title: FIONA SKIRT

description: Made of silk twill, with a striped necktie that can be neatly fastened or worn long and loose, our Sienna Bow Blouse is a vibrant twist on a ladylike silhouette. Its collage print is based on personal scrapbooks belonging to legendary designer David Hicks.
title: SIENNA BOW BLOUSE

description: Climbing floral embroidery and geometric eyelets detail the scalloped hem of our cropped Keira Jean. Clean-lined in powder-white denim, it makes a fresh addition to your workday and weekend lineup.
title: KEIRA JEAN

description: Folk-inspired ribbons and vibrant floral embroidery liven up the structured shape of our Adriana Skirt. Made of cotton voile, this elegant A-line is fitted through the hips and gives way to a knee-grazing hem.
title: ADRIANA SKIRT

description: A look we love: louche pajama dressing — beautifully embodied by our wide-leg Sienna Pant, the vibrant silk twill trouser Tory wore to the spring runway show. Its collage print is based on personal scrapbooks belonging to legendary designer David Hicks.
Zip-fly closure with button at center front
title: SIENNA PANT

description: Our vacation-ready Lottie Beach Caftan can go from the deck chair to dinner, depending on how its styled. It’s made from yarn-dyed cotton with macramé trim, fashioned into a relaxed shape with high side slits so you can walk with ease.
title: LOTTIE BEACH CAFTAN

description: Our silk twill Alyssa Top features a kaleidoscope print inspired by legendary designer David Hicks’s interiors — a mix of modern, vintage, graphic and abstract. Finished with channel-set tassel ties, it can be worn casually off one shoulder, as seen on our spring runway.
Drawstring ties at neckline and sleeves
title: ALYSSA TOP

description: The Madeline Cardigan reworks one of our signature merino wool knits, giving it a looser shape that’s easy to layer. Complete with slit sides, pockets and ribbed trim, it can be worn with everything from dresses to basic tees.
Sleeve length: 24" (60.2 cm); slit length: 2.75" (6.9 cm)
title: MADELINE CARDIGAN

description: Our silk twill Alyssa Pant features a kaleidoscope print inspired by legendary designer David Hicks’s interiors — a mix of modern, vintage, graphic and abstract. Cut with a high rise and a fluid shape, it looks elegant paired with its matching top, as seen on our spring runway.
Hidden zip fly with hook-and-bar closure
title: ALYSSA PANT

description: Scalloped embroidery and folk-inspired ribbon borders liven up the effortless shape of our Stephanie Tunic.This update to one of our signature designs is made of lightweight cotton voile.
title: STEPHANIE TUNIC

description: The perfect balance of rustic and refined: Our linen Eleanor Jacket is a wardrobe standout, polished up with beads, stones and raffia fringe. The contrast reads fresh, while the boxy, collarless fit keeps it feeling feminine and chic.
title: ELEANOR JACKET

description: Effortless, luxurious and chic. Straight from our runway, the Bella Cashmere Sweater has a relaxed shape that makes it easy to layer, a logo charm and slits at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeve length: 32" (80.3 cm); side slit length: 2.75" (6.9 cm)
title: BELLA CASHMERE SWEATER

description: Scalloped embroidery and folk-inspired ribbon borders liven up the structured shape of our Adriana Dress, a knee-grazing design made of cotton voile. It has a banded neck, a covered placket and a sculpting yoke seam that gives way to a crisply darted skirt.
title: ADRIANA DRESS

description: An artisanal riff on a five-pocket standard, our Connor Jean stands out for its crochet and raffia tassels at the hem. It’s done in indigo denim, with a stonewash rinse furthering the rustic feel.
title: CONNOR JEAN

description: A fresh take on the crisp wear-to-work shirt. Revised with bohemian details, our Sophie Top is loose-fitting and easy in poplin, with a slit neckline and broad cuffs that cinch with fabric ties and cap off with crochet and fringe trims.
title: SOPHIE TOP

description: Stripes and custom soutache trim decorate our Savonna Caftan, bringing an ornate finish to its sweeping design. Made from slub fabric, with a plunging neck, the runway style has a hood and ties both adorned with tassels, and high slits that allow it to move and flow with ease.
title: SAVONNA CAFTAN

variations.display_color_name: NEW IVORY/BLACK FILIPA RAYON SLUB STRIPE

description: An instant favorite for work or days on the move. Our Vanner Cropped Pant is a flattering silhouette with a sculpting effect, cut from a cotton blend with stretch for comfort and hold.
Front rise: 10.13" (25.4 cm); back rise: 14.13" (35.5 cm); inseam: 26.5" (66.5 cm)
title: VANNER CROPPED PANT

description: Accented with graphic embroidery and crochet trim, our openwork Ria Tunic is a breeze to wear. A hood and tassel ties give this Baja-inspired classic an easygoing finish.
Length: 28" (70.3 cm); side slit length: 5" (12.5 cm)
title: RIA TUNIC

description: An instant favorite for work or days on the move. Our Vanner Cropped Pant is a flattering silhouette with a sculpting effect, cut from a cotton blend with stretch for comfort and hold.
Front rise: 10.13" (25.4 cm); back rise: 14.13" (35.5 cm); inseam: 26.5" (66.5 cm)
title: VANNER CROPPED PANT

description: In a print inspired by Moroccan tapestry, our Double Diamond Beach Pant is ideal for casual days and warm-weather trips. The pair is breezy and lightweight, made in cotton voile with a relaxed wide leg and drawstring tassel ties at either side of the waist.
title: DOUBLE DIAMOND BEACH PANT

description: Plays on pattern. Crafted in fluid satin voile, our Tate Top is printed with geometric diamond motifs inspired by Moroccan tapestry. It has a pointed collar, buttoned cuffs and a slightly curved hem for a tailored finish.
title: TATE TOP

description: A striped tapestry print and custom soutache trim decorate our Corbin Caftan, bringing an ornate finish to its sweeping design. The runway style is made from specially sourced Indian cotton dobby with a plunging neck, both a hood and ties adorned with tassels, and high slits that allow it to move and flow with ease.
title: CORBIN CAFTAN

description: The Kit Short comes in an octagonal print developed by legendary designer David Hicks. The runway style is made from cotton terry cloth, cut with side pockets and a drawstring waist. Pair it with coordinating separates or with a bikini top on beach getaways.
Front rise: 11.25" (28.2 cm); back rise: 14" (35.1 cm); inseam: 2.88" (7.2 cm)
title: KIT SHORT

description: Our silk Brigitte Romper is printed with a geometric diamond motif inspired by Moroccan tapestry. This play on one of our design signatures can be worn as a cover-up or a tailored one-piece — easily transitioning from beach days to brunch.
title: BRIGITTE ROMPER

description: Our Louis T-Shirt comes in an octagonal print developed by legendary designer David Hicks. Straight fitting in pima cotton, it’s chic worn solo or as a graphic foundation to a layered look.
title: LOUIS T-SHIRT

description: Versatile, packable and chic. Straight from the runway, our lightweight, zip-up Digby Jacket folds down into its own pocket to become a compact belt bag. This fresh twist on a sporty anorak comes in an octagonal print developed by legendary designer David Hicks.
Folds up into a pocket pouch
title: DIGBY PACKABLE JACKET

description: Worn on the runway, our Josie Short easily segues from getaways to beach days and casual weekends. Made in soft terry cloth, with a drawstring waist and zip pockets, the pair can anchor an array of spring layers, including its matching hoodie, as seen at the show.
title: JOSIE SHORT

description: The Faye Culotte features an original diamond print from our archives. Relaxed and breezy, this pleated pair in fluid crepe de chine sways as you walk.
title: FAYE CULOTTE

description: Versatile, packable and chic. Straight from the runway, our lightweight, zip-up Devon Jacket folds down into its own pocket to become a compact belt bag. This fresh twist on a hooded windbreaker is cast in a graphic diamond print from our archives.
Folds up into a pocket pouch
title: DEVON PACKABLE JACKET

description: Our Wesley Cardigan comes in two scales of an octagonal print developed by legendary designer David Hicks. The button-down layer — chic over everything from t-shirts to feminine blouses — is made from lightweight cotton with silk georgette sleeves.
Button closure at center front; buttoned cuffs
title: WESLEY CARDIGAN

description: The cotton voile Alana Top features an original diamond print from our archives. Crisp and casual, the shirt is defined with pajama-like piping along the edges and chest pocket.
title: ALANA TOP

description: Our Lennox Polo comes in an octagonal print developed by legendary designer David Hicks. Made from soft cotton terry cloth, this prep style is great for everything from casual weekends to coastal retreats.
title: PRINTED LENNOX POLO

description: Our Lennox Polo Dress comes in an octagonal print developed by legendary designer David Hicks. Made from soft cotton terry cloth, this graphic update to a traditionally prep style is ideal for casual weekends, coastal retreats and more.
title: LENNOX POLO DRESS

description: From the runway: Our Gloria Skirt features delicate cutwork toughened up with hardware details. The linen showpiece is composed of octagonal guipure lace topped with metal tiles — an ode to legendary designer David Hicks. A solid back panel provides a smooth fit and brings contrast to the silhouette.
Hidden zipper with hook-and-eye closure at center back
title: GLORIA SKIRT

description: Our Gloria Top is made from octagonal guipure lace — an ode to legendary designer David Hicks. This modern rendition of a Sixties blouse has a trapeze-cut back panel done in cotton poplin and short sleeves, left sheer to bring lightness to the silhouette.
title: GLORIA TOP

variations.display_color_name: NEW IVORY/ BLACK GEOMETRIC GUIPURE SMALL

description: Beautiful textures and scalloped edges converge on our Bailey Skirt, a crisp pencil silhouette crafted in tapestry-inspired jacquard. A flat front with slanted pockets gives the fitted style a clean finish.
title: BAILEY SKIRT

description: Beautiful texture and scalloped edges detail our Bailey Blazer, a crisp jacket crafted in tapestry-inspired jacquard. Contouring seams, flap pockets and tonal buttons give the fitted style a clean finish.
Button closure at center front; buttoned cuffs
title: BAILEY BLAZER

description: An update to a timeless trench style, the double-breasted Nina Coat was a highlight of our runway show. Tailored in bonded linen-satin, it has a storm flap and lapels cut from lustrous pink fabric. Cuff straps and an inverted pleat at the back lend a classic finish.
title: NINA COAT

description: Garden variety: Our floral Adrian Skirt is bordered by graphics adapted from legendary designer David Hicks. The floaty A-line silhouette, made in a silk blend with metallic fil coupé threadwork, draws in at the waist with tassel ties.
title: ADRIAN SKIRT

description: Garden variety: Our floral Adrian Tunic is bordered by graphics adapted from legendary designer David Hicks. Made in a silk blend, with metallic fil coupé threadwork, this refined play on one of our signature styles is cut for an oversized fit, with a slit neck and banded cuffs.
title: ADRIAN TUNIC

description: Add feminine polish to your look with our Jess Top. Easy to layer in silk crepe de chine, it has a delicately gathered slit neckline, threaded with fabric ties.
title: JESS TOP

description: Our Channing Sweater is embroidered with florals and graphics adapted from legendary designer David Hicks. Knit from cotton and perfect for layering, the short-sleeve top is finished with delicate eyelets and ribbed trim.
title: CHANNING SWEATER

description: Our Stephanie Beach Caftan is cast in key prints of the season — vibrant graphic and patterns inspired by legendary designer David Hicks. This update to one of our signature designs is made of lightweight cotton voile, fashioned into a relaxed column shape with slit at the sides.
title: PRINTED STEPHANIE BEACH CAFTAN

description: Our Kayla T-Shirt is an effortless way to wear print. This lightweight crewneck is made from linen, contrasted by a lustrous front panel cut from silk.
title: KAYLA T-SHIRT

description: Our Stephanie Beach Caftan is cast in key prints of the season — vibrant graphic and patterns inspired by legendary designer David Hicks. This update to one of our signature designs is made of lightweight cotton voile, fashioned into a relaxed column shape with slit at the sides.
title: PRINTED STEPHANIE BEACH CAFTAN

description: Colorful, soft-focus stripes create a modern tie-dye effect on our Bettina Dress, a standout look from the runway. Great for desk-to-dinner wear, it sculpts a streamlined silhouette in pieced silk georgette with a belted wrap skirt, fixed in place with polished dome buttons.
Button closure at wrap seam and shoulder placket
title: BETTINA DRESS

description: Our Kayla T-Shirt is an effortless way to wear print. This lightweight crewneck is made from linen, contrasted by a lustrous front panel cut from silk.
title: KAYLA T-SHIRT

description: A fresh update to a casual standby. Our April T-Shirt is made from cotton with a flocked double-T logo at its center — bringing added texture to the design..
title: APRIL T-SHIRT

description: Made from garment-dyed denim, our Mara Jean has enough give for a flattering, comfortable fit. Wear the cropped pair with anything from simple pullovers to polished blazers.
title: MARA JEAN

description: Made from garment-dyed denim, our Mara Jean has enough give for a flattering, comfortable fit. Wear the cropped pair with anything from simple pullovers to polished blazers.
title: MARA JEAN

description: Garden variety: Our floral Kia Bow Blouse is bordered by graphics adapted from legendary designer David Hicks. A classic ladylike silhouette in silk georgette, the signature style’s versatile bow can be neatly tied or worn long and loose.
title: KIA BOW BLOUSE

description: Perfectly suited to workdays and low-key evenings, the Liam Dress is a fresh spin on a fit-and-flare silhouette. It has a flattering ribbed bodice, a banded waist and a full skirt with a raised wave motif.
title: LIAM DRESS

description: Menswear-inspired shirting is made getaway-ready on our Sandy Beach Tunic. The Henley-like style is done in striped cotton ticking, with a buttoned placket and contrast tassels at the cuffs and hem.
title: SANDY BEACH TUNIC

description: An ornate style for day or evening, this embroidered dress features embroidery inspired by traditional Romanian needlework and hand-beading on soft cotton canvas. It’s tailored for an effortless straight fit, with a crewneck and a thigh-grazing hemline.
title: EMBROIDERED DRESS

description: The epitome of bohemian chic and one of our first-ever designs, the iconic Tory Tunic is reworked for the season in slub fabric with stripes and custom soutache trim. It’s a classic for everyday and getaway dressing.
Split neck; mid-length sleeves; side slits
title: TORY TUNIC

variations.display_color_name: NEW IVORY/BLACK FILIPA RAYON SLUB STRIPE

description: The epitome of bohemian chic and one of our first-ever signature styles, the iconic Tory Tunic is reworked for the season in cotton voile, with an octagonal print developed by legendary designer David Hicks. It’s a classic for every day and getaways.
title: TORY BEACH TUNIC

description: Color-blocked and contoured for a swingy trapeze fit, our Willa Dress is paneled in three tones of stretch ponte — a fabric that holds its shape to emphasize the structure and volume of the silhouette. The effortless style layers well over tights and a turtleneck in cooler weather.
Hidden zipper with hook-and-eye closure at center back
title: WILLA DRESS

description: Fluttery details meet fluid movement. Constructed from pleated and ruffled tiers of dark red chiffon, our Stella Gown has romantic puff sleeves with flared cuffs and a floor-sweeping skirt that enhances its light-as-air feel.
Poly georgette lining at body; unlined sleeves
Button closure at neckline; hidden zipper at side seam
title: STELLA GOWN

description: Hidden zipper with hook-and-eye closure at center back
title: CAMERON DRESS

description: Dotted and detailed with irises: Our free-flowing Grotto Wrap Dress is an ode to legendary designer David Hicks’s interiors and gardens. The crepe de chine style has a flattering v-neck, ties that define the nipped-in waist and a full crossover skirt, all trimmed with ivory piping.
title: GROTTO WRAP DRESS

description: Luster, texture and graphic fil coupé threadwork come together on our silk-blend Jasmine Dress. This refined play on a peasant style skims a free-flowing silhouette with a ruffled collar, frilly cuffs and dual fabric ties that draw in the waist.
title: JASMINE DRESS

description: Luster, texture and graphic fil coupé threadwork come together on our silk-blend Jasmine Dress. This refined play on a peasant style skims a free-flowing silhouette with a ruffled collar, frilly cuffs and dual fabric ties that draw in the waist.
title: JASMINE DRESS

description: Graphic lines and glittering embellishment come together on our t-shirt–inspired Maisie Dress — a nod to legendary designer David Hicks. Worn on the runway, this mesh-knit sheath glitters with all-over printed sequins, specially chosen for their glossy finish and perfectly smooth shape. The ankle-grazing style flatters with a straight, effortless fit.
title: MAISIE DRESS

description: The graphic bands on our Christie Dress are inspired by legendary designer David Hicks — geometrics were one of his signatures. Made from silk georgette, the strapless gown has a high waist, delicate guipure lace insets and soft gathers to enhance the volume of the silhouette.
Hidden zipper closure at center back
title: CHRISTIE DRESS

description: Partial poly georgette lining at body
Leather D-ring belt with hook-and-thread loops
title: CLARICE DRESS

description: Garden variety: Our floral Port Shirtdress is bordered by graphics adapted from legendary designer David Hicks. Made from cotton poplin, with a flattering subtly flared skirt, the classic style works day or evening.
title: PORT SHIRTDRESS

description: Swirling soutache trim decorates our Lilliana Embellished T-Shirt Dress, bringing an ornate finish to its crisp design. The style is made from linen, with a plunging neck and tasseled drawcords at the waist.
title: LILIANA DRESS

description: Our Beatrice Dress is printed with a geometric diamond motif inspired by Moroccan tapestry. Featuring a bateau neck and dolman sleeves, this silk voile style drapes softly over the figure before ending on a raffia-fringed hem. Cinch the tasseled belt to elegantly define the waist.
title: BEATRICE DRESS

description: Garden variety: Our floral Serena Dress is bordered by graphics adapted from legendary designer David Hicks. In silk georgette, the floaty blouson style has a pleated bib, ties at the slit neck and waist, and ruching that creates elegant movement through its long, tiered skirt.
title: SERENA DRESS

description: Garden variety: Our floral Celeste Dress is bordered by graphics adapted from legendary designer David Hicks. A perfect transitional piece in silk crepe de chine, the shirtdress has a banded collar, buttoned cuffs and a handkerchief hem — lending a feminine note to the tomboy style.
title: CELESTE DRESS

description: Swirling soutache trim decorates our Lilliana Embellished T-Shirt, bringing an ornate finish to its crisp design. The style is made from linen, with a plunging neck and slits on the sides.
title: LILIANA EMBELLISHED T-SHIRT

description: Based on Seventies peasant blouses, our Candice Top casts a geometric diamond print on cotton voile, with folk-inspired ribbon embroidery and raffia trim. Both tassel ties at the neck and flared cuffs play up the chic, bohemian feel.
title: CANDICE TOP

description: Our tunic-inspired Ayla Top offers round-the-clock polish in ponte fabric with sequins and faceted stones clustered along its neckline and placket. The straight fit makes it effortless to wear.
title: AYLA TOP

description: Poly crepe de chine lining at body
Button closures at center front; buttoned cuffs
title: LIVIA DRESS

description: The epitome of bohemian chic and one of our first-ever designs, the iconic Tory Tunic is reworked for the season in soft cotton terry cloth with stripes and contrast trim. Worn on the runway, it’s a classic staple of everyday and getaway dressing.
Split neck; mid-length sleeves; side slits
title: TORY TUNIC

description: The epitome of bohemian chic and one of our first-ever designs, the iconic Tory Tunic is reworked for the season in soft cotton terry cloth with contrast trim. Worn on the runway, it’s a classic staple of everyday and getaway dressing.
Split neck; mid-length sleeves; side slits
title: TORY TUNIC

description: Our tunic-inspired Ayla Dress offers round-the-clock polish in ponte fabric with sequins and faceted stones clustered along its neckline and placket. The straight fit makes it effortless to wear.
Hidden zipper with hook-and-eye closure at center back
title: AYLA DRESS

description: Our Evalene Dress is a striking runway style, made from softly gathered crepe fabric. Split shoulders with leaf-accented ties frame and flatter the arms, while a banded waist nips in the column shape.
title: EVALENE TIE-SHOULDER DRESS

description: Elegant broderie anglaise and a ladylike shape combine to make our tiered Mariana Dress a standout. It’s made of cotton, with a shoulder-narrowing bodice that flatters, a banded waist and a scalloped tea-length hem.
Zipper with hook-and-eye closure at center back
title: MARIANA DRESS

description: Beautiful texture and scalloped edges detail our Bailey Dress, an all-occasion shift crafted in tapestry-inspired jacquard. Contouring seams, a banded waist and slit neckline add to its feminine feel.
Hidden zipper closure at center back
title: BAILEY DRESS

description: Free-flowing in plissé georgette, our Katherine Dress is printed with a geometric diamond motif inspired by Moroccan tapestry. It sculpts a modern column silhouette with wide straps, a cinching tassel tie at the waist and billowy sleeves that sit off the shoulder.
title: KATHERINE DRESS

description: Our Evalene Dress is a striking runway style, made from softly gathered crepe fabric. Split shoulders with leaf-accented ties frame and flatter the arms, while a banded waist nips in the column shape.
title: EVALENE TIE-SHOULDER DRESS

description: Our iris-printed Carine Dress is an ode to legendary designer David Hicks’s interiors and gardens. Light and lovely, the crepe de chine runway style is cut with a mockneck, an off-center placket and a sweep of pleats, dotted with eyelets on one side. A slim belt polishes off the silhouette.
Button closures at placket and collar
title: CARINE DRESS

description: Our Laurence Shirtdress is cast in a collage print based on personal scrapbooks belonging to legendary designer David Hicks. The belted style is done in silk interlock, a jersey-like knit known for its fluid drape, wrinkle resistance and smooth feel.
Button closure at center front and cuffs
title: LAURENCE SHIRTDRESS

description: Length: 70" (176 cm); width: 38" (95.4 cm); fringe: 1.75" (4.45 cm)
Machine wash warm; do not bleach
Tumble dry low heat; iron medium heat
title: T TERRY BEACH TOWEL
